verbs.description: if [ARG0: democrats] [V: win] [ARG1: midterms] trump could be planning a november surprise if his party loses the midterms trump might use a lame - duck session to get congress to give him a new attorney general or deputy attorney general and otherwise insulate him from future investigations by mueller or democrats brian beutler attorney trump congress democrats in norway deputy attorney general donald trump democrats
